process.description: TCP4-2271 Verify Miscellaneous of Script Tasks and Form Tasks
process.name: TCP4-2271 Verify Miscellaneous of Script Tasks and Form Tasks
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:laneSet>
      <bpmn:lane id="node_10" name="B">
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_12</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
      </bpmn:lane>
      <bpmn:lane id="node_11" name="C">
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_17</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_23</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_27</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
      </bpmn:lane>
      <bpmn:lane id="node_5" name="A">
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_3</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
        <bpmn:flowNodeRef>node_4</bpmn:flowNodeRef>
      </bpmn:lane>
    </bpmn:laneSet>
    <bpmn:task id="node_12" name="Fill Out Request" pm:screenRef="252" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:assignmentRules="[]" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_6</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_14</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_22</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_17" name="Review Request" pm:screenRef="253" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:interstitialScreenRef="" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}" pm:assignmentGroup="group">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_22</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_24</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_22" name="" sourceRef="node_12" targetRef="node_17"/>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_23" name="Daily Work Process Complete?">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_24</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_6</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_7</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_24" name="" sourceRef="node_17" targetRef="node_23"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_27" name="End Event" pm:screenRef="">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_7</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_6" name="No" sourceRef="node_23" targetRef="node_12">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">finish_case == "No"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_7" name="Yes" sourceRef="node_23" targetRef="node_27">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">finish_case == "Yes"</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_3" name="A" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}" pm:assignmentGroup="group" pm:screenRef="">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:scriptTask id="node_4" name="Script Task" pm:scriptRef="31">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_14</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:scriptTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_9" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_4"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_14" name="" sourceRef="node_4" targetRef="node_12"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:collaboration id="collaboration_0">
    <bpmn:participant id="node_1" name="Verify Miscellaneous of Script Tasks and Form Tasks" processRef="ProcessId"/>
  </bpmn:collaboration>
  <bpmn:message id="Notification" name="Notification Mail"/>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="collaboration_0">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="205" y="25" width="1105" height="541"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <dc:Bounds x="235" y="179.99999999999716" width="1075" height="190.00000000000293"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <dc:Bounds x="235" y="370.00000000000216" width="1075" height="195.99999999999784"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_12_di" bpmnElement="node_12">
        <dc:Bounds x="710" y="230" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_17_di" bpmnElement="node_17">
        <dc:Bounds x="710" y="410" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_22_di" bpmnElement="node_22">
        <di:waypoint x="768" y="268"/>
        <di:waypoint x="768" y="448"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_23_di" bpmnElement="node_23">
        <dc:Bounds x="970" y="430" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_24_di" bpmnElement="node_24">
        <di:waypoint x="768" y="448"/>
        <di:waypoint x="988" y="448"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_27_di" bpmnElement="node_27">
        <dc:Bounds x="1170" y="430" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="235" y="25.000000000000057" width="1075" height="154.99999999999994"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <di:waypoint x="988" y="466"/>
        <di:waypoint x="988" y="248"/>
        <di:waypoint x="826" y="268"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_7_di" bpmnElement="node_7">
        <di:waypoint x="988" y="448"/>
        <di:waypoint x="1188" y="448"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="310" y="70" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="470" y="50" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <di:waypoint x="328" y="88"/>
        <di:waypoint x="528" y="88"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_14_di" bpmnElement="node_14">
        <di:waypoint x="528" y="88"/>
        <di:waypoint x="768" y="268"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
